title: Ghostty Will Get You Excited About Using a Terminal Again
author: Jack Wallen
description: Although Mitchell Hashimoto's Ghostty is still in the early stages of development, it's already a fantastic terminal app that shows promise.
cntitle: Ghostty 将再次让你对使用终端感到兴奋
cndescription: 尽管Mitchell Hashimoto的Ghostty仍处于早期开发阶段，它已经是一款非常棒的终端应用程序，前景光明。
